name: Just a Gigolo: Going to Wet Cum!
name_original: Just a Gigolo: Going to Wet Cum!
description:
Welcome to the unbelievable virtual world of the artificial intelligence platform known as “GigoloAi”. such technology was developed by the giant porn industry known as “Gigolohub”.
Bradley is a blogging journalist invited to try the beta version of the system. the platform will be launched to the public soon and needs to prove its potential. when this happens, anyone will just use a headset to access the Gigolohub server. within seconds, the user will be inside the platform enjoying a unique experience of explicit sex.
the big issue is that Gigolo's artificial intelligence gains its own consciousness, creating situations that quickly get out of everyone's control. because of this, an incredibly unusual situation arises between Bradley, Lizzie, priska, and GigoloAi.
Lizzie enters the scene. she is one of the main developers of the technology. however, she was fired for disagreeing with the predatory policy of the company that owns the Gigolohub brand. for some time she is close to Bradley after discovering that he is the main promoter of the technology. however, after disappearing for some time, she decides to return to help Bradley and his girlfriend.
who is the real villain? the machine, the company, or the mafiosos who manipulate the corporate strings in search of more obscene profits?
this is what we will find out soon.
All characters are over 21 years old



The game is a visual novel-in-progress, utilizing classic Ren'py controls and containing high-quality renders as well as fully animated and non-animated, non-censored adult scenes. There's plenty more to come in the future.
